deploy_action_simple.desc: Deploy an action against all computers using human strings.

deploy_action_simple_without_results.desc: Deploy an action against all computers using human strings, but do not get the completed results of the job -- return right away with the deploy action object.

deploy_action_simple_against_windows_com.desc: Deploy an action against only windows computers using human strings. This requires passing in an action filter

deploy_action_with_params_against_window.desc:
Deploy an action with parameters against only windows computers using human strings.

This will use the Package 'Custom Tagging - Add Tags' and supply two parameters. The second parameter will be ignored because the package in question only requires one parameter.
